= Introduction =

The script requires [http://code.google.com/p/pygeoip/ pygeoip] python module to work properly. It also requires [http://www.maxmind.com/app/geolitecountry GeoIP country] [http://geolite.maxmind.com/download/geoip/database/GeoLiteCountry/GeoIP.dat.gz database].

= Details =

Install pygeoip module from your repository, or just download its source and put it in the same directory as spilp.py.

Also, after downloading GeoIP.dat.gz from MaxMind website, extract the archive, and put GeoIP.dat database into the same folder as spilp.py.
